definition: Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]
pincers/pliers/tongs/claw (of animal)/to grasp with pincers/to pinch/to clamp/to restrain/to restrict/to gag

sentences.english: Secure all work with clamps or a vise, freeing both hands to operate tools.
sentences.chinese: 使用夹钳或虎钳固定工件，以便空出双手来操作工具。

sentences.english: Bottom mount, self closing, with flange and clamp.
sentences.chinese: 底部放置，自动关闭，带缘边及夹钳。

sentences.english: The clamping device of soaking-pit crane.
sentences.chinese: 夹钳起重机的开闭机构。

sentences.english: He checked that clamp but failed to find anything wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他查看了那只夹钳，但是没发现任何问题。

sentences.english: This is a crane-type horizontal plate clamp parts PDQ.
sentences.chinese: 这是起重机的配件PDQ型水平钢板夹钳。

sentences.english: The clamps shape need as that of crucible, Avoiding the concertrate stress destruction the crucible.
sentences.chinese: 坩埚夹钳应与坩埚形状相符，避免局部受力损坏。

sentences.english: God is a Lobster, or a double pincer, a double bind.
sentences.chinese: 上帝是大龙虾，有一对鳌钳或一对夹钳。

sentences.english: Sturdy metal tongs measuring about 15 inches long are like having an extra set of heatproof hands.
sentences.chinese: 金属夹钳约有15英寸长，附有耐热手柄。

sentences.english: Dual-action stainless swivel clamps can move many direction up and down.
sentences.chinese: 双套不锈钢夹钳，可上下多方向移动。

sentences.english: The Rotation Control Box of soaking-pit crane.
sentences.chinese: 夹钳起重机的旋转控制箱。

sentences.english: Microgripper technique was one of important parts in micromachine techniques.
sentences.chinese: 微夹钳技术是微机械技术的重要内容之一。

sentences.english: This machine is a horizontal plate clamp PDQ.
sentences.chinese: 这种机器是PDQ型水平钢板夹钳。

sentences.english: The Auxiliary Hoist (Lifting Mechanisms) of soaking-pit crane.
sentences.chinese: 夹钳起重机的副起升机构。

definition: pincers/pliers/tongs/claw (of animal)/to grasp with pincers/to pinch/to clamp/to restrain/to restrict/to gag
bolt (male component of nut and bolt)/screw
